name: MERP Systems, Inc.
description:
MERP Systems, Inc. (MERP Systems) is an IT services organization that specializes in enhancing enterprise communication and enabling enterprise collaboration through proven technology solution framework. Custom application development and support are provided to federal agencies and other clients based on business needs. 
Expertise Area Include: 
Microsoft Dynamics & CRM Portal Support (Microsoft Partner) 
SharePoint Applications Development & Support Drupal Portal Support (Acquia Partner) Salesforce Consulting Web Services Development (UDDI, WSDL, SOAP) Microsoft dot Net Development Database Administration (Oracle, Microsoft SQL/Server, Sybase, MySQL) Business Objects Reporting 
Certifications & Contract Vehicles: 
8(a) Certified GSA IT Schedule 70 GS-35F-409CA 
MERP supports United States Geological Survey, Department of Commerce, Fish and Wildlife Service, Food & Drug Administration, Department of Labor, USPTO, and CFPB.
